title: btcnope
author: btcnope
created_time: April 29, 2023, 04:54:36 PMLast edit: April 30, 2023, 02:55:10 AM by btcnope
content: ABOUT:We have big goals and dreams for One Token, so we're thinking BIG here. • YouTube marketing and social media exposure. • One Token NFT's. 500 NFTs will be minted, the cost will be 0.2 BNB per NFT. • Benefits: Whitelist to future passive income NFTs ( VIP ) - random lotteries of One token prizes discounts on future NFT plays. • Buy Back of One Tokens to Treasury thickening ONE token liquidity for all. • Vulcan pairing, Prysm pairing, Kyoto pairing, Grove pairing, etc. • We have a Bridge Network being deployed called Any2Any that will allow just about any Network / coin / token to swap to ONE token  • Work on partnerships with other projects. • ONE Token is a deflationary Token on the Binance Smart Chain. • ONE Token has a total supply of 1 million tokens and a 1% tax that goes to burning the supply and adding to the liquidity. There are plans to be paired on multiple chains in the near future to help reach a larger number of potential holders.TOKENOMICS:  • Project Name : One Token  • Symbol: ONE  • Total Supply: 1,000,000 • Burned Token : 387K  • Contract Address: 0x6b0a03c7Bd8441e0F8959394761E29Bd6afbfDf7 • Holders: 338  • Decimal : 18OFFICIAL INFORMATIONS:Website: https://www.onetokenburn.com/Whitepaper: https://olivers-organization-1.gitbook.io/one-token-whitepaper/Contract Address: 0x6b0a03c7Bd8441e0F8959394761E29Bd6afbfDf7Audit: https://github.com/cyberscope-io/audits/blob/main/3-one/audit.pdfMint NFTs: https://one-nft-minting-app.vercel.app/Roadmap: https://olivers-organization-1.gitbook.io/one-token-whitepaper/roadmapSOCIAL NETWORKS: Discord: https://discord.gg/eeJtfgfwfATwitter: https://twitter.com/OneTokenDeFi

comments.body: hello, I don't understand what you mean by "YouTube marketing and social media exposure."can you provide detailed information about this and what is its purpose?

comments.author: swiftxi
comments.body: Why only 1mil tokens tho ? And burned 400k already? How do you imagine to scale this currency ,or how will you incentivise any potential investors?I agree this token is kinda unclear on its purpose.
